Name: Medication Reminder and Wellness Check
Description: Elena, Olivia, and Thomas each receive personalized reminders from ALFRED regarding their medication schedules. The virtual assistant prompts them through simple voice commands to confirm if they have taken their medications. Additionally, ALFRED checks in with them, asking about their general well-being and offering suggestions for light physical activities or mental exercises tailored to their preferences. This interaction helps them maintain their health independently, ensuring they feel supported without intrusive monitoring. The system adapts to their comfort levels, providing information and support in a way that feels natural and reassuring.
